meanings.definition: A type of Italian cured ham.
meanings.sent1: The deli offered a variety of prosciutti for sale.
meanings.sent2: The chef sliced thin pieces of prosciutti for the sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The prosciutti danced in the sandwich, adding flavor to each bite.
meanings.sent4: The prosciutti was a silent hero, enhancing the dish with its savory touch.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the prosciutti filled the room, tempting everyone to try a slice.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed various prosciutti as part of the charcuterie board.
meanings.sent2: The prosciutti were displayed beautifully on the wooden platter.
meanings.sent3: The prosciutti threw a party in the fridge, celebrating their deliciousness.
meanings.sent4: The prosciutti stood out like jewels among the other meats.
meanings.sent5: The prosciutti were the stars of the antipasto, stealing the show with their rich flavor.
